inclusion.criterion: Patients for elective inguinal hernia and undescended testis operations.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Body weight less than 10 kg or greater than 30 kg (children below age of 6 years with body weight more than 30 kg are definitely obese with a risk of airway obstruction along with the abnormal volume of distribution of drugs if given according to their actual body weight)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with known allergy to any of the medications used
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: A 5 months old male patient with undescended testis, no developmental delay, and normal physical assessment.
